bwwExcerpt: "All the elements are here for a one-of-a-kind musical experience, but everything would be wasted if not for this phenomenally talented cast, from Steel Burkhardt, whose Berger gets the audience ready for a night of in-your-face theater with some improvised crowd interaction and a silly striptease; to Remillard's endearing Claude; to Caren Lyn Tackett's knockout Sheila. The Pantages hasn't been graced with a cast this good since "Wicked." It's nearly two-and-a-half hours of straight song, and no
